annotations.label: soccer-ball

Some great controlled play and passing in the middle of the pitch from Bayern Munich.
Mario Gotze (Bayern Munich) is flagged for offside once again, but it was a very tight call this time.
Mario Fernandes (CSKA Moscow) is forced to stop his attacking move after the linesman signals for offside.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Bastian Schweinsteiger showcases his great technique and produces a beautiful lofted cross into the box. Sebastian Rode (Bayern Munich) meets the cross and gets himself onto the scoresheet with a header down into the middle of the net. It's 2:0.

annotations.label: corner

Arjen Robben (Bayern Munich) plays a one two with Robert Lewandowski, but the move breaks down.

Alan Dzagoev (CSKA Moscow) takes the resulting free kick from outside the box. He sends a nice cross into the box, but his intention is well anticipated by the goalkeeper who comes out to collect the ball.

Robert Lewandowski (Bayern Munich) picks up a pass and unleashes a low shot towards goal, but he can't generate enough power to trouble Igor Akinfeev.
Jerome Boateng (Bayern Munich) blows an opportunity as he sends a rebound from just outside of the box narrowly wide of the left post.

Arjen Robben (Bayern Munich) is forced to stop his attacking move after the linesman signals for offside.
Bayern Munich keep possession of the ball with some short passes, waiting for the moment to hit the opposition swiftly on the break.

annotations.label: corner

Arjen Robben (Bayern Munich) leaps highest to meet a cross and steers a header towards the right post, but the goalkeeper produces a crucial save to thwart the effort.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Olegario Benquerenca blows his whistle and the second half starts.

We have seen a few chances and nice movements, but the overall impression of the game is rather average and not hugely entertaining. The hosts were superior in their performance in the first half. They were more active and precise. The home side display their usual fluent passing, while the visitors use their organization to stop the build up and launch counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That is it for the first half after the referee blows his whistle and the players head to their respective dressing rooms.

That was a nice football moment. Bastian Schweinsteiger (Bayern Munich) receives an amazing defence splitting low pass on the edge of the box and blasts the ball towards the roof of the net. Igor Akinfeev guesses his intention and dives superbly to deny him with a remarkable save! The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Bayern Munich.

Mario Götze (Bayern Munich) is first to the rebound and sends a header goalwards but it's blocked. Wow, what an escape there for the opposition.

Kirill Nababkin (CSKA Moscow) produces an attempt from the edge of the box which would have most likely endangered the goalkeeper, but one of the defending players blocked it, so we can only speculate about the outcome.

Hello to all football fans, we are here to bring you a live commentary of the following match, describing all the most interesting and important moments. We'll make sure you won't miss a thing, so just sit back and have fun.

There was no time for the supporters to get bored during the game as it was full of action and thrilling moments. The superiority of the home team was evident on the pitch today. The home team made a lot of passes and attempted to maintain possession. The away side's tactic was counter attacking.
